author: pieterdavid
body:
Tested with a calcMode='true' and a calcMode='observed' example,
for the former identical results, for the latter there are some
differences the level of 1.e-12

#### PR description:

<Replace python list with numpy array and use numpy in calculation to speed up pileupCal.py >

#### PR validation:

<The validation was presented: https://indico.cern.ch/event/1037464/#1-simulation>

title: Use numpy and scipy to speed up pileupCalc.py
